*/import*as Yup from"yup";import checkout from"layouts/pages/users/new-user/schemas/form";const{formField:{firstName,lastName,email,password,repeatPassword,address1,city,zip,twitter}}=checkout;const validations=[Yup.object().shape({[firstName.name]:Yup.string().required(firstName.errorMsg),[lastName.name]:Yup.string().required(lastName.errorMsg),[email.name]:Yup.string().required(email.errorMsg).email(email.invalidMsg),[password.name]:Yup.string().required(password.errorMsg).min(6,password.invalidMsg),[password.name]:Yup.string().required(password.errorMsg).min(6,password.invalidMsg),[repeatPassword.name]:Yup.string().required(repeatPassword.errorMsg).oneOf([Yup.ref("password"),null],repeatPassword.invalidMsg)}),Yup.object().shape({[address1.name]:Yup.string().required(address1.errorMsg),[city.name]:Yup.string().required(city.errorMsg),[zip.name]:Yup.string().required(zip.errorMsg).min(6,zip.invalidMsg)}),Yup.object().shape({[twitter.name]:Yup.string().required(twitter.errorMsg)})];export default validations;
